tha-ap326:0.3_0: He enjoys himself with sacrificers, and sometimes doesn’t;

tha-ap326:11.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap326:12.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Saṅgāmaji.

tha-ap326:5.2_0: because of my mother, my father,

tha-ap326:6.3_0: They have seen the Truths of others,
